identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.description: A hyper-functional, density-optimized aesthetic that prioritizes data clarity over decoration. It rejects 'SaaS soft' roundness in favor of architectural precision.
core_principles: Density is Clarity: If it can fit in 1 page, don't make it 2.
Black & White is Colorful: Use 10 shades of grey to create depth.
The Grid is God: Align everything. Visible grid lines are encouraged.
No Rounded Corners (mostly): Sharp edges = Sharp consulting.

theme_strategy.note: Strictly Light Mode for 'Paper/Report' feel as per Consulting aesthetic. Dark mode optional but secondary.

navigation.visual: Border-right only. No background color change. Minimalist list.

styles.primary: bg-zinc-950 text-white hover:bg-zinc-800 shadow-none border border-transparent
styles.secondary: bg-white text-zinc-900 border border-zinc-200 hover:bg-zinc-50 hover:border-zinc-300 shadow-sm

cards.style: border border-zinc-200 bg-white shadow-none hover:border-zinc-300 transition-colors

tables.header: h-10 px-2 text-left align-middle font-medium text-muted-foreground [&:has([role=checkbox])]:pr-0

shadcn_overrides: Remove all rounded-lg, replace with rounded-sm or rounded-none
Set all border colors to border-zinc-200

textures.noise: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay at 2% opacity on the main background to kill the digital flatness.

time_tracking.component: Stacked bar chart for daily activity visualization.

image_strategy.fallback: Use Initials for User Avatars (e.g., 'JD' in a circle). Use Abstract Geometric Patterns for empty states.
image_strategy.login_hero: CSS Pattern: Radial Gradient from Zinc-100 to White, with a Grid Overlay.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Go to /app/frontend/src/index.css. Override the root variables to remove all 'blue-ish' tints. Make them pure gray (Zinc/Neutral). Set radius to 0.2rem.
2. COMPONENT CLEANUP: Open /app/frontend/src/components/ui/button.jsx (and card, input, etc). Search for 'rounded-md' or 'rounded-lg' and REPLACE with 'rounded-sm'.
3. DENSITY CHECK: In layout.jsx (or equivalent), ensure the Sidebar width is fixed (w-64) and the Main Content has 'p-8'.
4. NO GRADIENTS: Do not use gradients for buttons or backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle borders.
5. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attributes.

accessibility.contrast: APCA preferred. Ensure Gray-500 text is only used on White, never on Gray-100.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible 2px outline in Black (#000) for keyboard navigation.
